goal.en: "1. The study gene structure and function at the macromolecular level. 2. Molecular biology course leads students to investigate the life sciences from different angles."
goal.ch: 1. 以生物大分子結構與功能探來討生命現象之本質。2. 培養學生從不同角度及合理邏輯探討生命現象。
